content: the jardin hat is part of the jardin family patterns all knitted in the beautiful and textured heart stitch the hat is knitted bottom-up from the cast-on edge up to the crown the loose fit and beanie shape the beautiful textured stitch and the warm fluffy yarn make this hat a must for cold winter days **this pattern is my gift to you as a thank you for your support and encouragement and i hope you ll like this hat as much as i do ** **finished measurements** the hat circumference is approximately 32 34 36 38 40 cm and the length from cast-on to the crown is approximately 17 20 23 25 27 cm **sizes available** baby child adult s adult m adult l **yarns and yardage** the green sample used 3 strands of yarn held together for this hat you ll need approximately 120 160 200 240 260 m of a fingering weight yarn and 240 320 400 480 2520 m of lace weight yarn as it is held held double you can also choose 1 strand of a worsted-weight yarn **needles** 5 mm us 8 circular needles 40 cm 16 long or double-pointed needles 4 mm us 6 circular needles 40 cm 16 long for the ribbing **notions** stitch marker tapestry needle
